solution_line_template: So, Mike and Ted planted {mike_morning} + {ted_morning} = <<{mike_morning}+{ted_morning}={morning_total}>>{morning_total} tomato seeds in the morning.
In the afternoon, Ted planted {mike_afternoon} - {ted_afternoon_fewer} = <<{mike_afternoon}-{ted_afternoon_fewer}={ted_afternoon}>>{ted_afternoon} seeds.
Thus, Mike and Ted planted {mike_afternoon} + {ted_afternoon} = <<{mike_afternoon}+{ted_afternoon}={afternoon_total}>>{afternoon_total} tomato seeds in the afternoon.
Therefore, they planted {morning_total} + {afternoon_total} = <<{morning_total}+{afternoon_total}={total_seeds}>>{total_seeds} tomato seed altogether.
